# Preface

::: callout-note
This is a book created using the "Quarto book" system. To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.
:::

The first edition was published as an outcome of the COST Action: UV4Growth. After the end of the Action, the UV4Plants Association was formed. This second edition is being produced under the auspices of the [UV4Plants Association](https://www.uv4plants.org/).

This new edition will be made available as work in progress, i.e., written in the open.

**The planned chapters are:**

1.  Introduction

2.  Radiation and optics

3.  The UV, VIS and NIR environment of plants

4.  Quantifying UV and VIS radiation

5.  Measurement of optical properties of leaves

6.  Manipulating UV and VIS radiation

7.  Imaging in UV, VIS and short IR radiation

8.  Cultivation of plants for UV and other photobiological experiments

9.  Design, planning and data analysis from photobiological experiments

10. Ensuring reproducibility
